verbs.description: Donald Trump [V: has] been lying about how much he paid for Melania ’s more than 10-carat diamond engagement ring .
Donald Trump has [V: been] lying about how much he paid for Melania ’s more than 10-carat diamond engagement ring .
[ARG0: Donald Trump] has been [V: lying] [ARG1: about how much he paid for Melania ’s more than 10-carat diamond engagement ring] .
Donald Trump has been lying about [ARG1: how much] [ARG0: he] [V: paid] [ARG3: for Melania ’s more than 10-carat diamond engagement ring] .
